name: DAVBOT
description:
DAVBOT  is a 3 Chaptered 2D Platformer. Kill Enemies. Grab Coins. Break out from Good Old City.

Future: DAVBOT Will Have a Multiplayer mode in the Future so you can Escape Together or Race with each other.

Story: The M.O.P Company is own by Your Creator Dr. AI Mopsky. The Latest Robot that They Created is DAVBOT. Sometime Later the DAVBOT AI Got Mind of its own So He Wanted to Get His Own Life but the Company Didn't let Him. So Your Task is To Help Him Escape The M.O.P Company Dr. AI Mopsky will try to Stop you with his Biggest Creations.

Informations:

DAVBOT v0.5 will have a Preview Version Before the Release the Preview Version will be only available for those who will contact our mail dogstudiosofficial@gmail.com on 18 of November 2022. Send us a Message that you want to see DAVBOT 0.5 Preview for yourself

Mobile Version when the PC is DONE (Sorry Mobile Gamers)
